maintext:
Michelle Kath Sinclair still has a vivid memory of her father, original Chicago guitarist Terry Kath, who died nearly 40 years ago when she was only about two. She and her parents were traveling in a boat near a Wisconsin lodge owned by her grandparents. “I was on my mom’s lap,” she tells Rolling Stone. “[My father] was

title: Chicago's Terry Kath: Inside the Life and Tragic Death of an Unsung Guitar Hero
